duties_responsibilities.duty: Work with Product Owners to document requirements for multiple applications.
Transpose business requirements into technical requirements for developers.
Perform Quality Assurance checks across Tier 1 sites for misspellings, grammar, broken links, etc.
Gather requirements for new functionality within the ecosystem.
Ensure all business requirements are created and delivered to the appropriate dev teams, while adhering to SLAs.
Aid in testing for releases and special projects.
